short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Force a forground text colour of black and a background colour of white.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses a CSS rule to force a foreground text colour of black and a background colour of white to make dark mode pages light mode. This improves accessibility for people who struggle to read white text on black.
